title: Hitpoints/Level up table
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Constitution/Level up table
LevelNew abilities
Each level
  • Each level grants one extra point of health
  • The number of hitpoints that Anglerfish restore is based on hitpoints level. Can be used to boost above base level.
  • Saradomin brews heal 15% of hitpoints level plus 2 per dose. Can be used to boost above base level.
